English: lit. the mountain can't have two tigers (idiom)

h.b: ㄧ　ㄕㄢ　ㄅㄨˋ　ㄖㄨㄥˊ　ㄦˋ　ㄏㄨˇ

e: `如~：「`所謂~`一山不容二虎~，`今天~`既然~`遇~`著~`了~，`我們~`就~`在~`此~`分~`出~`個~`高下~。」
d.f: （`諺語~）`比喻~`實力~`相當~`或~`互~`不相容~`的~`兩~`人~`不能~`同~`在~`一處~。

h.p: yī shān bù róng èr hǔ

English: lit. the mountain can't have two tigers (idiom)
fig. this town ain't big enough for the two of us
(of two rivals) to be fiercely competitive
